body.p: Comedi has a Google Group and mailing list for announcements, questions, and discussion about Comedi and data acquisition using Linux.

An alternative way to subscribe to the mailing list without a Google account is to send an email to: comedi_list+subscribe@googlegroups.com and reply to the confirmation email to complete the subscription.
To unsubscribe from the mailing list without a Google account, send an email to: comedi_list+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com from the email address you subscribed with.
Mailing list archive before May 2002 is not currently available
